title: banning smurf
body:
hi all,
so last ranked game i played i encountered a yasuo jungle on my team. i was confused as to why he went yasuo jungle and asked him if yas jg even works he replied no it doesn't, i don't want to win because all Australians are pigs and don't deserve to win. i tried to ignore him, which was hard with him half feeding half playing properly. towards the end of the game i got salty at him because of his build challenging smite bloodrazor, zhonya's hourglass, hextech protobelt-01, ninja tabi, guardian angel, and phantom dance. althought most of these are decent on yasuo the two ap items i didnt understand and when i said something to him he then said thresh (me) is a pig and doesnt deserve to win.
after the game i looked at his profile and it appears that he is either a smurf or been banned recently since his honourable opponent and firendly icons are all at 0 1 or 2. so i would just like to ask if he is a smurf can his account please be banned permanently or if he as already been banned once that the next course of action please be taken because this ruined what was actually a fun game when he was playing seriously

also im not sure where to post this so if someone knows where this should be sent to please advise me
his ign is
*name removed*

thanks,
relentless fatee
